name: Blacksmith (itch) (PROBO)
description:
- We'll make money in the blacksmith's shop and build a reputation so you can buy better materials or make a nice sword.

- I can only show you the background, but I'll tell you about the game plan.

- The main character goes to prison for a crime he cannot admit. But he was the only blacksmith in the city, working in a blacksmith's shop. There is no choice but to open a blacksmith's shop in prison.

- A system is being constructed to heat the ingots in a kiln to select the desired sword shape and to grind them into whetstone, and to complete the sword by combining the handles.

- The main background concept is the Middle Ages, and I think it will be a first-person RPG game.

- You may accept or refuse to produce weapons by letter in prison.

- I will try to show you the gameplay within this year.

- There are no plans to release it, and I don't think it'll be possible to release it this year.

- The download below is a level preview. I would appreciate it if you could play and give me feedback.

- The performance of the computer that is producing this game.

(GPU GTX 1050Ti) (RAM 8Gb) (CPU i7 - 4770)

And I want to show you a higher quality, but it's not easy. 

I'd like to upgrade my computer's specifications, but I'm still a high school student. 

The graphic I'm showing you right now is that I can't afford it. 

It's the best option, but I'd like to show you a better graphic. 

The speed of the work gradually slows down as it is created. 

If you contribute to the development of the game, we will do our best to repay you. 

Only those who sponsored will remember the nickname so that they can see it in the game.

- Please understand that the specifications are significant because there are currently no graphic option settings.

- Feedback or reviews are always welcome!

- I'd appreciate it if you'd pay attention to my game!

If you follow me, I'll see you better.             

- Control : W A S D ( CTRL crouch ) ( ESC quitgame )
